title: First amendment protects petition for redress

content.question: Which of the following is one of the central concerns of the First Amendment?

choices.label: The supremacy of the national over the state governments
The right of citizens to bear arms
The division of powers among the three branches of government
The right of citizens to petition the government for redress of grievances
The protection of the rights of those accused of committing a crime

content.answer: The right of citizens to petition the government for redress of grievances
